learning.supervised.meta.boosting.baselearners

Class HwKNNBoostable

  • java.lang.Object
    • learning.supervised.Classifier
      • learning.supervised.meta.boosting.BoostableClassifier
        • learning.supervised.meta.boosting.baselearners.HwKNNBoostable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Citable, NSFUserInterface, java.io.Serializable, ValidateableInterface, DistMatrixUserInterface, DistToPointsQueryUserInterface, NeighborPointsQueryUserInterface

    public class HwKNNBoostable
extends BoostableClassifier
implements DistMatrixUserInterface, NSFUserInterface, DistToPointsQueryUserInterface, NeighborPointsQueryUserInterface, java.io.Serializable
    This class implements the hw-kNN method for hubness-based instance weighting in kNN classification. This approach was proposed in the following paper: "Nearest Neighbors in High-Dimensional Data: The Emergence and Influence of Hubs" at ICML 2009.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • setMisclassificationCostDistribution

        public void setMisclassificationCostDistribution(double[][] instanceLabelWeights)
        Description copied from class: BoostableClassifier
        This method sets the current label misclassification cost distribution for each instance. If x has the label y, then instanceLabelWeights[x][y] should be zero, as no additional cost is associated with the proper classification (that information is provided in the other instance weighting method, for clarity). In any case, such values will be ignored. As for the remaining weights, they should sum up to 1 for each instance.
        Specified by:
        setMisclassificationCostDistribution in class BoostableClassifier
        Parameters:
        instanceLabelWeights - double[][] of the cost distributions over labels for each DataInstance in the training data.

      • noRecalcs

        public void noRecalcs()
        Description copied from interface: NSFUserInterface
        Indicating that the object is shared and no recalculations can be done on it for synchronization purposes. An empty implementation is appropriate in methods that do not modify the NeighborSetFinder object's content.
        Specified by:
        noRecalcs in interface NSFUserInterface

      • setDistMatrix

        public void setDistMatrix(float[][] distMatrix)
        Description copied from interface: DistMatrixUserInterface
        Distance matrix setter.
        Specified by:
        setDistMatrix in interface DistMatrixUserInterface
        Parameters:
        distMatrix - float[][] representing the upper triangular distance matrix. Each row i contains only entries for j > i, due to distances being symmetric. For compression, the zeroed lower triangular entries are not stored, so each row i contains (size - i - 1) elements. The entry in distMatrix[i][j] corresponds to the distance between data points i and i + j + 1.

      • getDistMatrix

        public float[][] getDistMatrix()
        Description copied from interface: DistMatrixUserInterface
        Distance matrix getter.
        Specified by:
        getDistMatrix in interface DistMatrixUserInterface
        Returns:
        float[][] representing the upper triangular distance matrix. Each row i contains only entries for j > i, due to distances being symmetric. For compression, the zeroed lower triangular entries are not stored, so each row i contains (size - i - 1) elements. The entry in distMatrix[i][j] corresponds to the distance between data points i and i + j + 1.
